author: Staff Reporter
text: A 28-year-old man was hacked to death by a group of armed men at Kadapakkam in Kancheepuram district on Wednesday . Police said Vasanth Rajagopal, son of village administrative officer Rajagopal of Kappivakkam near Kadapakkam, was on his morning walk when the incident took place. Chunambedu police registered a case and have sent the body to Chengalpattu Government Hospital for a post-mortem. Police cite enmity to be the reason behind the murder and added that investigation was under way.
title: VAO’s son hacked to death
